title: mystery skin option gone?
body: Why is the option to buy myself a mystery skin gone?

replies.body:
The [**Mystery items**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/worlds-hits-the-rift-2017/) were only available for a short window during Worlds. That sucks you weren't able to get more before they left =(

https://i.gyazo.com/b774c3ffbc5c5193676338016a2b546b.png
